DOC.brief_summary: Laparoscopic ovarian diathermy ( LOD ) currently offer infertile woman polycystic ovarian syndrome ( PCOS ) fail conceive clomiphene citrate ( CC ) . However , use LOD CC may result good reproductive outcome since LOD may reduce risk associate CC miscarriages multiple pregnancy . The aim study evaluate effectiveness LOD potential value improve success rate infertile woman PCOS . This study recruit 72 woman PCOS suffer infertility due lack ovulation infertility clinic . After initial assessment , patient give explanation study receive information leaflet . They randomize two group : Group1 ( 36 patient ) receive CC per infertility clinic protocol induce ovulation 6 month . Group 2 ( 36 patient ) undergo laparoscopic ovarian diathermy general anaesthetic . Blood sample take group treatment , shortly treatment 3 6 month treatment measure various hormone . Patients contact every month treatment follow . The reproductive outcome particularly pregnancy livebirth rate compare two group .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Laparoscopic Ovarian Diathermy Clomiphene Citrate Women With Anovulatory PCOS
